name: Buddy Carter
tweet_text: I believe that government red tape and bureaucracy should not be able to hold up important infrastructure projects. POTUS agrees, which is why he traveled to ATL last week to announce new rules to streamline the NEPA review process without compromising environmental protections.

name: Buddy Carter
